completion.item:
Adds an item to this item
Parameters: (gara.jswt.TreeItem) item - the item to be added
Throws: TypeError - when the item is not type of a TreeItem
Create container for items
Deselect all child items

Returns the child container
Returns: the child container

Returns wether there are items or not
Returns: true wether there are items or false if there are non

Internal method for creating a node representing an item. This is used for creating a new item or put updated content to an existing node of an earlier painted item.
Parameters: (boolean) wether - this item is at the bottom position or not

Returns the checked state for this item
Returns: the checked state

Returns the expanded state for this item
Returns: the expanded state

Returns a specifiy item with a zero-related index
Parameters: (int) index - the zero-related index
Throws: OutOfBoundsException - if the index does not live within this tree
Returns: the item

Returns the amount of the items in the tree
Returns: the amount

Returns an array with all the items in the tree
Returns: an array with the items

Returns the widgets parent, which must be a Tree
Returns: the parent of this widget

Returns the item's parent item, which must be a TreeItem or null when the item is a root.
Returns: the parent item

Internal event handler
Parameters: (Event) e - W3C event

Looks for the index of a specified item
Parameters: (gara.jswt.TreeItem) item - the item for the index
Throws: gara.jswt.ItemNotExistsException - if the item does not exist in this tree TypeError - if the item is not a TreeItem
Returns: the index of the specified item

Registers Listener for this widget
Parameters: (String) eventType - the event type (Object) listener - the listener
Removes all items from that item

Sets the item active or inactive
Parameters: (boolean) active - true for active and false for inactive

Sets the checked state for this item
Parameters: (boolean) checked - the new checked state

Sets a new expanded state for the item
Parameters: (boolean) expanded - the new expanded state
Updates this item
